title: Transformers - Beast Wars - Ascending [BigBonedNinja][h33t]
description:
[IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/284/aclkjhgfdvrajb8.jpg[/IMG]

Spiraling out of the events in Beast Wars: The Gathering... MAGMATRON?now a disembodied entity, existing out of time and space?is witness to CYBERTRON&#039;s unchecked descent into chaos and madness, all of which is a prelude to its complete and utter destruction! Powerless to directly affect this terrifying apocalypse, MAGMATRON?s last desperate recourse is to try and bring his greatest enemy, RAZORBEAST, together with fellow MAXIMALS LIO CONVOY and THE PACK! By The Gathering team of Simon Furman and Don Figueroa.

Thanks to the original scanners and uploaders.

Please keep seeding!
